function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased thrombotic and micro-vascular complications in severe COVID-19 patients, leading to COVID-19-associated coagulopathy (CAC)","Impact":"Higher risk of mortality and severity of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement anticoagulant therapy and closely monitor patients for signs of coagulopathy","Technologies":"Anticoagulant medications, advanced monitoring systems","People":"Severe COVID-19 patients, particularly those in ICU","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, medical staff"},{"Description":"Invasion of the central nervous system by SARS-CoV-2, leading to neurological complications","Impact":"Increased risk of neurological symptoms and complications, including loss of sight/smell/taste, headache, and stroke","Mitigation":"Develop protocols for monitoring and managing neurological symptoms in COVID-19 patients, investigate treatments to protect the blood-brain barrier","Technologies":"Neuroimaging, neurological monitoring devices, drug therapies targeting the blood-brain barrier","People":"COVID-19 patients with neurological symptoms","Owner":"Neurologists, healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Active infection of the digestive system by SARS-CoV-2, leading to gastrointestinal symptoms","Impact":"Increased prevalence of gastrointestinal symptoms such as diarrhea, vomiting, and related complications","Mitigation":"Implement strategies to manage gastrointestinal symptoms in COVID-19 patients, develop treatments targeting digestive system infection","Technologies":"Gastrointestinal diagnostic tools, antiviral therapies for the digestive system","People":"COVID-19 patients with gastrointestinal symptoms","Owner":"Gastroenterologists, healthcare professionals"}]}
